content: उत्सन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Decayed. {@--2@} Destroyed, ruined, uprooted, left off; उत्सन्नोस्मि <ls>K. 164</ls> undone; मकरध्वज इवोत्सन्नविग्रहः <ls>K. 54</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 44</ls>; °निद्रा <ls>K. 171</ls>; उत्सन्नो युधिष्ठिरः <ls>Ve. 2</ls> extirpated. {@--3@} Curseed, wretched; <ls>K. 198.</ls> {@--4@} Fallen into disuse, extinct (as a book). {@--5@} Finished, completed. {@--6@} Risen, increased (<ab>opp.</ab> अवसन्न). {@--7@} Accomplished easily (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
